attributes.action: Halal slaughtered meat and poultry should be clearly labelled
attributes.additional_details:
Make restaurants and take-aways selling Halal slaughtered meat and poultry clearly so label this produce so that customers may have a choice about buying or not.  I have objections to such methods of slaughter and I think I have a right to refuse to eat such produce. I need the information in order to make a choice.
This produce is becoming more and more common, and not to meet the religious requirements of customers.  We need accurate labelling please.
